QueryDefinition.Query: select cast(replace(i.ptid, 'PT','') as bigint) as PersonId, i.immunization_date, i.ndc, SUBSTRING(i.ndc,1,9) ndc_9 from {sc}.immunizations as i JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND i.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE where pt_reported = 'N' and ndc is not NULL and i.immunization_date is not null order by cast(replace(i.ptid, 'PT','') as bigint)
